Welcome to the IDPET documentation!

Last updated: June 2024

IDPET (Intrinsically Disordered Protein Ensemble Tools) is a Python package for comprehensively analyzing of the conformational ensembles of disordered proteins. It is built upon the mdtraj library for reading the ensemble files in various formats. IDPET provides informative visualizations based on multiple global and local features of the flexible regions of proteins. Additionally, it integrates various dimensionality reduction and statistical methods to facilitate the analysis of conformational ensembles.
